item.ptxt: Use the same procedures for the LH side and RH side.
The procedure listed below are for the LH side.
A bolt without a torque specification is shown in the standard bolt chart (See page ).

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Align the claws with the seat belt positioning holes and install the retractor of the seat belt with the bolt as shown in the illustration.
Connect the shoulder anchor with the bolt.
Close the cover cap.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Align the claws with the seat belt positioning holes and install the retractor of the seat belt with the bolt as shown in the illustration.
Connect the shoulder anchor with the bolt.
Close the cover cap.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL QUARTER INSIDE TRIM BOARD LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws, 8 clips and 2 guides to install the quarter inside trim board.
Install the clip.
Connect the rear No. 1 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.
Connect the rear No. 2 seat outer belt floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT REAR NO. 2 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Connect the seat belt's floor anchor with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT REAR NO. 1 SEAT BELT ASSEMBLY OUTER LH

s2.ptxt: Connect the seat belt's floor anchor with the bolt.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure for both quarter trim hooks.

s2.ptxt: Install the quarter trim hook with the screw.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR OPENING TRIM WEATHERSTRIP LH

s2.ptxt: Align the paint mark on the rear door opening trim weatherstrip with the mark position on the vehicle and install the rear door opening trim weatherstrip as shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR DOOR SCUFF PLATE LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 3 clips and 7 claws to install the rear door scuff plate.
Attach the 6 clips and 4 claws to install the back door scuff plate.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL REAR NO. 2 SEAT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Fully tilt the seatback forward.
Place the seat onto the lock striker.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to damage the vehicle body.

s2.ptxt: Install the bolt on the rear side of the seat.
Install the bolt on the front side of the seat.
Fully lock the seat to the lock striker.

atten4.ptxt: Confirm that the seat is firmly locked to the lock striker.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

s2.ptxt: Perform initialization (See page ).

atten3.ptxt: Certain systems need to be initialized after disconnecting and reconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal.
